title: manasaaramathi
sahitya:
manasAramatiyaNi shivan maghanai dinamum ninai tIngaNugAdu unai

anupallavi

kaNamum maravAmalE ninai ekkAlamum ninai kAlan aNugAn unai
caraNam

mAl maruganai muruganai (tiru) rati manmathanai minjum azhaganai 
vEL aNiyum mArbanai (vaDi) vIranai vENDi ninai unai kAttaruLbavanai
